titleStmt.title: The valorous acts performed at Gaunt, by the brave bonny lasse Mary Ambre; who in revenge of her lovers death, did play her part most gallantly. To the tune of, The blind beggar,.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Gibertson [sic] in Giltspur-street.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "When Captain couragious, whom deeth coul'd not ..."
In two parts, printed side by side.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
